name: prmetrics
description: Augments pull request titles to let reviewers quickly determine PR size and test coverage.

scripts.build:prepare: cross-env-shell "cd .. && mkdirp ../build/$npm_config_dir && ncp . ../build/$npm_config_dir && cd ../build/$npm_config_dir/task && npm install"
scripts.build:release: npm run build:prepare --dir=release && cd ../../build/release/task && tsc && rimraf node_modules tests **/*.ts .mocharc.json .nycrc.json tsconfig.json typedoc.json && npm install --only=production
scripts.build: npm run build:debug && npm run build:release && npm run build:docs
scripts.deploy:debug: npm run build:debug && exitzero tfx build tasks delete --task-id 907d3b28-6b37-4ac7-ac75-9631ee53e512 --no-prompt && tfx build tasks upload --task-path ../../build/debug/task --no-prompt
scripts.deploy:release: npm run build:release && exitzero tfx build tasks delete --task-id 907d3b28-6b37-4ac7-ac75-9631ee53e512 --no-prompt && tfx build tasks upload --task-path ../../build/release/task --no-prompt

author: Microsoft Corporation
